name: Gather
headline: Building a better way to meet online.
description:
Gather is a video chat platform designed to make virtual interactions more human. Our mission is to create opportunity and connection for everyone, no matter where they are. We do this by building the Metaverse, a virtual layer over the physical world where people can work, socialize, and learn. 

Since we launched in May of 2020, Gather has brought millions of people together. We have raised a total of $77 million in Series A and B from Sequoia Capital, Index Ventures, and more. We’re a small, friendly team based out of a state-of-the-art virtual office, where you can work whenever and wherever suits you. Come join us!

https://www.fastcompany.com/90692692/gather-inclusive-metaverse-vr

# Your Virtual HQ
Gather brings the best of in-person collaboration to distributed teams.
[Get started](https://www.gather.town/<https:/app.gather.town/get-started>)[Or take a tour](https://www.gather.town/<https:/www.gather.town/take-a-tour?utm_source=marketing&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=group-tour&utm_content=office-page>)
[Get started](https://www.gather.town/<https:/app.gather.town/get-started>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/640642d487bb294c34df2050_Star%206.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/640642962d6a7b0b4d469a27_Star%205.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/640643218def2ffb98cefcee_Star%208.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/640644b54c044561733508ca_Star%209.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/6406427fd35e3db12a52cfc4_Star%204.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/640642fa7d41d60cbce94fe0_Star%207.svg)
## The in-person moments you’ve been missing
PROXIMITY AND VISIBILITY
### Bring your remote team closer together
Communicate, collaborate, and feel more connected in a persistent space that reflects your unique team culture.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/643efaed7bdd2933eec28371_home%20proximity.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/643efaed50a294a779d34a2e_home%20moments.png)
SERENDIPITOUS MOMENTS
### Talk naturally throughout your day
Stop by someone's desk, say hi in the hallway, and bring back water cooler chats. No scheduling required.
PRODUCTIVE CONVERSATIONS
### Meet in the moment
Collaborate in the moment or schedule team meetings to keep everyone aligned and work moving forward.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/643efaedee179c6b6c275e75_home%20conversations.png)
## Everything remote teams need to get work done

## Why distributed teams love Gather
[](https://www.gather.town/<https:/www.gather.town/customer-stories/intuition-systems>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/6762f72a1dbeafa0084f2e5b_Billy-Headshot%201-1.png)
Billy Luedtke
CEO of Intuition Systems
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/6762f8386909b913a2235b99_Intuition-Systems-Feature-Card.png)
It’s not just about being connected; it’s about fostering that same shared momentum, urgency, and camaraderie that drives great teams to achieve extraordinary results, no matter where they are.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/643d8a048430f3298b762eb3_Quotation%20mark.svg)
Read Customer Story
[](https://www.gather.town/<https:/www.gather.town/customer-stories/human-i-t>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/673e4b6166dcef5a2bb7f478_gabe-mimddleton-profile.jpeg)
Gabe Middleton
CEO & Co-Founder at Human-I-T
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/673e4cf9e4c9220dd54e23d1_Human-I-T-Feature-Card.png)
Gather is the cornerstone of our communication and collaboration at Human-I-T now. It’s hard to think of a situation or a world where we're not using Gather.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/643d8a048430f3298b762eb3_Quotation%20mark.svg)
Read Customer Story
[](https://www.gather.town/<https:/www.gather.town/customer-stories/beatport>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/67003f1d50ad7eed40d22da9_morgan-soley-profile.jpeg)
Morgan Soley
Director of Engineering at Beatport
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/67003ebe8db585df709823f5_beatport-office-bright.png)
Thanks to Gather, we communicate better. There are fewer meetings on the calendar. And we’re pushing forward faster. It’s been transformative to our remote culture.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/643d8a048430f3298b762eb3_Quotation%20mark.svg)
Read Customer Story
[](https://www.gather.town/<https:/www.gather.town/customer-stories/weme-increased-employee-engagement-with-gather>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/6708042a6a2d38f901d9ab3a_carolina-kia-weme-headshot.jpeg)
Carolina Kia
CEO at weme
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/6708046c31b0ff3b190e92b1_weme-virtual-office.png)
It’s not only about having fun. It’s about people feeling that they belong somewhere. And when people are happy, they stay at their company and deliver better results. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/643d8a048430f3298b762eb3_Quotation%20mark.svg)
Read Customer Story
[](https://www.gather.town/<https:/www.gather.town/customer-stories/cto-labs-remote-team-culture>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/6707ec05aa4af0a54dcdf3fa_Mike-Mengell.png)
Mike Mengell
CTO and Co-Founder of CTO Labs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/671bb72e8e9a8737cf2cf456_CTO-Labs-Feature-Card-2x.png)
Team culture happens in the moments between meetings and we were hungry to get back into that norm. When we found Gather we instantly fell in love with it.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/643d8a048430f3298b762eb3_Quotation%20mark.svg)
Read Customer Story
[](https://www.gather.town/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/dtobon_accountingandaccountants-taxtwitter-activity-7250128013793595392-jW3A?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/6707e52de54e1c296a0ef863_daniel-tobon-profile.jpeg)
Daniel Tobon
Founder & Tchnololgy Strategist at Tsquared Technologies
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/671bb6eb14ee1ce0e7552c79_Daniel-Tobon-Feature-Card-2x.png)
One of the things we miss about being in an actual office is the casual chats—those quick "Hey, can I ask you something?" moments. Gather lets us do that virtually!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/643d8a048430f3298b762eb3_Quotation%20mark.svg)
View on LinkedIn
[](https://www.gather.town/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/noe-horowitz_leadership-engineering-remotework-ugcPost-7191233240119037952-dg2i?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/670563654a8f2ff57378abc3_Noe%20Horowitz.jpeg)
Noé Horowitz
Director of Engineering at Guidance Analytics 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/670563b8de85831fc86e1f4a_GuidanceTeam.png)
Moving away from Zoom, where interactions were confined to scheduled sessions, has revolutionized our daily connections. Now, it’s like walking through a real office.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/643d8a048430f3298b762eb3_Quotation%20mark.svg)
View on LinkedIn

PROXIMITY AND VISIBILITY
### Bring your remote team closer together
Communicate, collaborate, and feel more connected in a persistent space that reflects your unique team culture.

## Why distributed teams love Gather
[](https://www.gather.town/<https:/www.gather.town/customer-stories/intuition-systems>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/6762f72a1dbeafa0084f2e5b_Billy-Headshot%201-1.png)
Billy Luedtke
CEO of Intuition Systems
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/6762f8386909b913a2235b99_Intuition-Systems-Feature-Card.png)
It’s not just about being connected; it’s about fostering that same shared momentum, urgency, and camaraderie that drives great teams to achieve extraordinary results, no matter where they are.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/643d8a048430f3298b762eb3_Quotation%20mark.svg)
Read Customer Story
[](https://www.gather.town/<https:/www.gather.town/customer-stories/human-i-t>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/673e4b6166dcef5a2bb7f478_gabe-mimddleton-profile.jpeg)
Gabe Middleton
CEO & Co-Founder at Human-I-T
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/673e4cf9e4c9220dd54e23d1_Human-I-T-Feature-Card.png)
Gather is the cornerstone of our communication and collaboration at Human-I-T now. It’s hard to think of a situation or a world where we're not using Gather.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c885e8fb810536398b658a/643d8a048430f3298b762eb3_Quotation%20mark.svg)
Read Customer Story
[](https://www.gather.town/<https:/www.gather.town/customer-stories/beatport>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/67003f1d50ad7eed40d22da9_morgan-soley-profile.jpeg)
Morgan Soley
Director of Engineering at Beatport
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f99c52b298c7753381c38/67003ebe8db585df709823f5_beatport-office-bright.png)
Thanks to Gather, we communicate better. There are fewer meetings on the calendar. And we’re pushing forward faster. It’s been transformative to our remote culture.

generated_description:
**Gather: Bridging Virtual Connections**

Since its inception in May 2020, Gather has established itself as a significant player in the realm of virtual interactions. Founded in San Francisco and an alumnus of Y Combinator's S19 batch, Gather is not just another video chat tool; it's a platform designed to humanize online meetings, making them more engaging and effective.

**The Mission**  
Gather's mission is simple yet profound: "Building a better way to meet online." This mission reflects a commitment to enhance connections for people everywhere—whether in professional settings, casual meet-ups, or educational discussions—by creating a unique, immersive experience reminiscent of real-world interactions. Think of it as creating a virtual layer over our physical world, an accessible Metaverse where work and play can seamlessly coexist.

**The Journey So Far**  
Gather has seen impressive growth since launch, bringing millions together virtually. With a team of around 60 talented individuals, the company has successfully raised $77 million in Series A and B funding, backed by major players like Sequoia Capital and Index Ventures. This solid financial foundation supports a vision of continuous innovation and enhancement of its platform.

**Why Gather Stands Out**  
Gather transforms traditional remote work dynamics by emphasizing proximity and visibility. It creates an environment where team members can communicate freely, pop by each other's 'desks,' and even engage in impromptu conversations—mimicking the natural flow of an in-person office. This approach is not just functional; it cultivates a sense of community and camaraderie among dispersed teams.

**Targeted Solutions**  
The platform’s offerings span various use cases including virtual offices, team meetings, and social gatherings. It’s particularly beneficial for remote work, education, and even virtual conferences. The plethora of integrations, such as Slack and Google, enhances its utility, allowing users to stay connected and productive without the hassle of switching between applications.

**User Testimonials**  
The feedback from Gather’s users underscores its impact. From CEOs to employees, users report an enhanced culture, better communication, and improved efficiency in their remote interactions. It's evident that Gather isn’t just a tool; it's become integral to how teams collaborate and thrive in diverse environments.

**In Conclusion**  
For anyone looking to redefine their online meeting experience and foster a genuine sense of connection among remote teams, Gather is an exceptional choice. Whether you’re a startup seeking to cultivate a vibrant workplace culture or an established firm looking for innovative solutions, Gather is ready to help you bridge the gaps that distance creates.

For more information or to get started, visit [Gather Town](https://www.gather.town/).
